mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance ( attendance_id, users_seq, attendance_date, check_in_time, check_out_time, status ) VALUES ( attendance_seq.nextval, #{users_seq}, sysdate, #{check_in_time}, NULL, '출근' )
mapper.update: update attendance set check_out_time = #{check_out_time}, status = '퇴근' where TRUNC(attendance_date) = TRUNC(sysdate) and users_seq = #{users_seq}
mapper.select: select check_in_time, check_out_time from attendance where users_seq = #{users_seq} and TRUNC(attendance_date) = TRUNC(sysdate)
